long_description: A standard for police and military applications, the low-visibility 150 ft. BlueWater Assaultline static rope is designed for tactical and rescue work. Kernmantle construction features a braided nylon sheath over nylon strand core that offers low static elongation and superior abrasion-resistance. Special Blue Water design allows line to absorb accidental shock load to lower risk of anchor failure or individual injury.
short_description: A standard for police and military applications, the low-visibility 150 ft. BlueWater Assaultline static rope is designed for tactical and rescue work.
